content.text:
# I pledge allegiance to the flag of the United States of America and to the Republic for which it stands, one Nation indivisible, with liberty and justice for all.

#REDIRECT Pledge of Allegiance#Addition of "under God"
*Note: This is a historical variant of the Pledge of Allegiance used from 1924–1954. As there are still people alive who recall this variant of the Pledge, this redirect retains an actual use, and it is not the result of error or otherwise. See Public Law 77-829 § Sec. 7. and Public Law 83-396.
